item.title: Continous Delivery with Drone and Dokku
item.description: A part of my job as CTO of Output is managing our deployment and production systems. To this end, I’ve spent a lot of time working with virtualization, Docker and automation recently. I’ll try to share some of our experiences here in the months to come. One of our biggest challenges has been to get a good testing culture internally. To that end, I wanted a solid solution for CI.
